titleStmt.title: [Patrikon dōron, or], A legacie to his sonnes digested into quadrins / by Henry Delaune.
titleStmt.author: Delaune, Henry.

notesStmt.note: First two words of title in Greek characters; first three words of title faded, information from caption title, p. 1.
This work is a metrical paraphrase of King James's "Basilikon doron".
The penitent Christian his metamorphosis (p. [67]-80) has special t.p. and continuous paging.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
